result.ga: chuaigh mé soir go baile Átha cliath
result.orig: Chuaigh mé soir go Baile Átha Cliath
result.html: chuaigh mé soir go baile Átha cliathI went up to Dublin.
result.ponchtml: ċuaiġ mé soir go baile Áṫa cliaṫI went up to Dublin.

result.eng: The rain will spread east during the day.
result.ga: leathfaidh an bháisteach soir i rith an lae
result.orig: Leathfaidh an bháisteach soir i rith an lae
result.html: leathfaidh an bháisteach soir i rith an laeThe rain will spread east during the day.
result.ponchtml: leaṫfaiḋ an ḃáisteaċ soir i riṫ an laeThe rain will spread east during the day.

result.eng: I am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.
result.ga: tá mé ag dul soir go gaillimh inniu tar éis na hoibre
result.orig: Tá mé ag dul soir go Gaillimh inniu tar éis na hoibre
result.html: tá mé ag dul soir go gaillimh inniu tar éis na hoibreI am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.
result.ponchtml: tá mé ag dul soir go gailliṁ inniu tar éis na hoibreI am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.

result.eng: I live a couple kilometers up (eastwards) the road.
result.ga: cónaím cúpla ciliméadar soir an bóthar
result.orig: Cónaím cúpla ciliméadar soir an bóthar
result.html: cónaím cúpla ciliméadar soir an bótharI live a couple kilometers up (eastwards) the road.
result.ponchtml: cónaím cúpla ciliméadar soir an bóṫarI live a couple kilometers up (eastwards) the road.

result.eng: There was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.
result.ga: bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theas
result.orig: Bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theas
result.html: bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theasThere was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.
result.ponchtml: ḃí gaineaṁ do gaċ leiṫ dínn soir siar ṫuaiḋ ṫeasThere was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.
